def_cn: 不同意;有分歧;意见不合
def_en: If you disagree with someone or disagree with what they say, you do not accept that what they say is true or correct. You can also say that two people disagree .
If you disagree with a particular action or proposal, you disapprove of it and believe that it is wrong.

def_cn: (尤指食物)对…不适宜，使…身体不适，不合…胃口
def_en: If a particular food or drink disagrees with you, it makes you feel unwell.
